sub_title: Portfolio Manager West Africa & Indonesia at Anton Jurgens Fonds
summary:
Als Portfolio manager Buitenland verantwoordelijk voor het beheer en de uitbreiding van initiatieven rondom voedselzekerheid in West Afrika, Indonesië en de Filipijnen.

Als Agripool recruiter voor Agriterra verantwoordelijk voor het werven en selecteren van de beste experts vanuit het Nederlands Agrarisch bedrijfsleven die hun kennis willen inzetten voor collega coöperaties in Afrika, Azië en latijns-Amerika. 

As liaison officer Agribusiness at Agriterra - a foundation specialized in strengthening farmers organizations in developing countries worldwide - I strengthen ambitious cooperatives in Uganda who would like to expand their business. By assessing them thoroughly and support them with (technical) expertise from Dutch Agribusinesses and experts, we help them to make their business plan bankable and to get access to finance. Specifically we strengthen cooperatives on the business planning, financial management and setting up a strong marketing department. 

Previously I worked for Africa’s Eden, a company which focuses on nature conservation & research in Gabon, São Tomé & Príncipe and the Central African Republic by developing low-impact tourism, through the concept of 'tourism pays for conservation'. Within Africa’s Eden, I worked in different disciplines of the organization. Starting as a financial manager with the responsibility of setting up the financial administration in the head office in The Netherlands and improving and structuring the financial administration in the office in Port Gentil, Gabon. Simultaneously I have set up the reservations department from scratch. This resulted in a good functioning department enabling income from tourism for the nature conservation & research activities. As Sales Manager I promoted our product worldwide and as Team Manager I managed the daily operations in the Dutch office.

Specialties: Business development in Africa

education.field_of_study: Entrepreneurship and Cooperation, MBA Food & Finance
M. Sc Business Administration, specialisation International Management

school.name: Université des Sciences et Techniques du Languedoc (Montpellier II)

profile_positions.description: Als Portfolio manager Buitenland verantwoordelijk voor het beheer en de uitbreiding van initiatieven rondom voedselzekerheid in West Afrika, Indonesië en de Filipijnen.
profile_positions.title: Portfolio Manager West Africa & Indonesie

profile_positions.description: Werving en selectie van experts vanuit de coöperatieve en agrarische sector in Nederland voor inzet kennis bij Agriterra klant coöperaties en landbouworganisaties. Vergroten van het netwerk in agrarische sector in NL en daarbuiten en agribusiness en organisaties begeleiden/adviseren bij opzetten van systemen voor interne werving en voorselectie van deskundigen.
profile_positions.title: Agripool Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Liaison officer within the Agribusiness team: making cooperatives bankable. Responsibilities: client identification and selection by performing country scoping and company assessments, qualitative and quantitative financial management analysis, analysis of organisational and legal structure, business plan development and analysis, project and budget planning, performance monitoring and evaluation, relationship building with financial institutions and producers and processors in the Netherlands, investment capital and working capital mobilisation. 

Advisory assignments:
- November 2014: Study Uganda with Impact Investor
- October 2014: Governace & Investment Plan development Burkina Faso
- March 2014: cooperative business analysis Burkina Faso
- March 2014: cooperative business analysis Tanzania
- November 2013: business analyses for investment opportunities Uganda
- August 2013: Expert mission Uganda: connecting dairy farmers to new opportunities
- Januari 2013: Expert mission Frieslandcampina
- October 2012: haalbaarheidsstudie duurzame positionering primaire producenten Oeganda
- May 2012: Scoping and company assessment mission SACCO's Uganda
- April 2012: Advisory mission with Rabobank Maas en Waal to strengthen local SACCO Uganda
- April 2012: Advisory mission with Friesland Campina to execute a market study to identify market opportunities for union who envisages to process milk 
- January 2012: Company assessment Iria-Ini coffee coop, Nyeri, Kenya, together with Michiel Kuit, coffee consultant
- December 2011: Scoping and monitoring mission Uganda
- August 2011: Identification of coffee cooperatives with business potential in Kenya, together with Dutch specialty coffee trader Trabocca 
- June 2011: Business assessments at fish feed manufacturing plant and the development of commercial fish production with ponds in Uganda.
profile_positions.title: Bedrijfsadviseur Boergenoteerde bedrijven: cooperative business development

profile_positions.description: Projects officer for agricultural organisations in Congo DR, Burundi, Armenia, Ethiopia, Jordan and Palestina. Focus on strengthening of their financial administration and the development of economic initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Projects officer
Business Development Africa's Eden
